summary: Used air conditioner purchase website where the business buys used AC units from customers at good prices
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard currently has no authentication - publicly accessible by anyone who visits /admin route
known_issues: Error occurring when customers submit quote form
Error occurring when checking customer contact details in admin dashboard

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that explains the business purchases used air conditioners from customers at competitive prices
Implement a form where customers can submit details about their used air conditioner including brand, model, age, condition, and contact information
Display pricing information or guidelines showing factors that influence the purchase price of used air conditioners
Implement a contact section with business contact information and operating hours

Design a professional visual theme with warm, trustworthy colors (earth tones, greens, or warm neutrals), modern sans-serif typography, and a clean layout that conveys reliability and environmental responsibility
Update the pricing information page to display all price values in Indian Rupees (₹) instead of dollars ($), including the example pricing tiers and any monetary amounts shown
Update any other pages that display currency amounts (home page, contact page, success page) to show Indian Rupees (₹) instead of dollars ($) for consistency across the entire application
Update the footer contact phone number list in the Layout component to display the three phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, and +917095510215, replacing the existing phone number entry
Create an admin dashboard page accessible at /admin route that displays all customer AC submissions in a table format showing brand, model, customer name, phone number, email, and submission date
Add a navigation link to the admin dashboard in the header navigation menu so the business owner can easily access customer submissions
Display the total count of customer submissions at the top of the admin dashboard page so the business owner knows how many customers have registered
Implement Internet Identity authentication protection for the admin dashboard route (/admin) so that only authenticated users can access customer submission data
Display a login button or prompt on the admin dashboard page when user is not authenticated, using the existing Internet Identity authentication system
Add a logout button in the header or admin dashboard that allows the authenticated business owner to sign out and clear their session
Add the Admin Dashboard navigation link to the mobile menu in the Layout component so it appears when users open the hamburger menu on mobile devices
Add proper error handling and logging in the frontend useQueries.ts getAllSubmissions hook to catch and display specific error messages when the backend call fails
Update the Admin.tsx page to display a more specific error message when the submissions query fails, including retry functionality and troubleshooting guidance

Update the PricingInfo.tsx page to add a dynamic pricing calculator section that displays estimated prices based on AC age and condition: for AC age 2-3 years in good condition show ₹3,000-4,000; for AC age 3-5 years show ₹2,500; for dead/non-functional AC show ₹2,000

Add interactive inputs or dropdowns to the pricing calculator allowing customers to select AC age range (2-3 years, 3-5 years, or dead/non-functional) and condition to see the corresponding estimated price displayed immediately

Debug and fix the AC submission form error in frontend/src/components/ACSubmissionForm.tsx by adding comprehensive error handling, logging the exact error message to the console, and displaying a user-friendly error message when the submission fails
Update the useACSubmission hook in frontend/src/hooks/useACSubmission.ts to properly catch and propagate backend errors with detailed error information including the error type and message

Add form field validation in ACSubmissionForm.tsx to prevent submission of invalid data, including checks for non-empty brand/model, valid age range (0-20 years), valid condition selection, and properly formatted phone/email
Update the SubmissionSuccess.tsx page to accept and display the submitted customer contact details (name, phone, email) that were entered in the AC submission form
Update the ACSubmissionForm.tsx component to pass the submitted customer contact details (customerName, phone, email) to the success page via navigation state when the submission is successful

Fix the SubmissionSuccess.tsx page to correctly display the owner's contact details (business phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, +917095510215) when a customer successfully submits a quote, ensuring these contact details are visible and properly formatted

Fix the Admin Dashboard authentication flow to properly trigger Internet Identity login when users click on the Admin Dashboard link in the navigation, ensuring the authentication dialog appears and users can successfully authenticate before accessing the admin page

Debug and fix the Admin Dashboard navigation button click handler in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to ensure it properly triggers the Internet Identity login dialog when the user is not authenticated
Add error handling and user feedback in the Admin Dashboard button click handler to display a loading state during authentication and show error messages if the login process fails

Debug the Admin Dashboard button click handler in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to identify why the Internet Identity login dialog is not appearing when clicking the Admin Dashboard navigation button
Fix the Internet Identity login trigger in the Admin Dashboard navigation flow to ensure the login dialog appears immediately when an unauthenticated user clicks the Admin Dashboard button
Add comprehensive error handling in the Admin Dashboard click handler to catch any errors during the authentication flow and display user-friendly error messages when the login process fails
Verify that the useInternetIdentity hook's login() function is properly resolving and handling the authentication callback, ensuring it completes the authentication process successfully

Add comprehensive console logging throughout the Admin Dashboard button click handler in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to trace the authentication flow execution, including logging when the button is clicked, the current authentication state, when login() is called, and when navigation occurs

Verify that the useInternetIdentity hook's login() function in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts is properly initialized and not returning undefined or null when called from the Layout component

Fix the Admin Dashboard navigation flow in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to ensure the Internet Identity login dialog appears immediately when an unauthenticated user clicks the Admin Dashboard button, and only navigate to /admin after successful authentication

Add detailed error boundary and try-catch blocks around the authentication flow in the Admin Dashboard click handler to catch any JavaScript errors, AuthClient initialization failures, or promise rejection errors, and display user-friendly error messages in the UI

Fix the Admin Dashboard authentication logic in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to check if the user is already authenticated before calling login(). If the user is already authenticated, navigate directly to /admin without triggering a new authentication flow.

Update the Admin Dashboard click handler in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to add a conditional check: if isAuthenticated is true, skip the login() call and navigate directly to /admin using navigate('/admin').

Add error handling in the Admin Dashboard click handler to catch and display a user-friendly error message when the authentication system detects that a user is already authenticated but login() is called anyway.

Add comprehensive error logging in the frontend ACSubmissionForm.tsx component to capture and log the exact error message, error type, and full error object to the browser console when the quote submission fails, including any backend rejection reasons or network errors

Debug and fix the Admin.tsx page getAllSubmissions query error by adding comprehensive error handling in the useQueries.ts hook to catch specific backend errors (authentication failures, canister errors, network timeouts) and display actionable error messages to the user

Add error boundary and try-catch blocks in the Admin.tsx page component to catch any rendering errors or data transformation errors when displaying customer contact details, logging the full error stack trace to the console

Add network error handling in the useActor.ts hook to detect and handle canister communication failures, including timeout errors, connection refused errors, and invalid canister ID errors, displaying user-friendly error messages

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for purchasing used air conditioners from customers
Create a backend data model to store air conditioner submissions with fields for brand, model, age, condition, customer name, phone, email, and submission timestamp
Change currency display from dollars to Indian Rupees (INR)
Update contact section with phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, +917095510215
Implement customer submission notification system so business owner knows when customers register their AC details
Create admin interface or system to view and manage customer AC submissions with contact details
Create a backend function to retrieve all customer AC submissions with their contact details (name, phone, email) so the business owner can view who has registered
Add authentication/login system to protect admin dashboard so only business owner can access customer submissions with credentials
Add a backend authentication check to verify that only authenticated principals can retrieve customer submission data via getAllSubmissions and getSubmission functions
Deploy the application to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible with a permanent canister URL that can be shared with customers
Debug and fix the backend getAllSubmissions function in backend/main.mo to ensure it correctly retrieves and returns all customer AC submission data without errors
Verify that the backend authentication check in getAllSubmissions properly validates the authenticated principal and does not reject legitimate authenticated users
Update pricing guidelines to show age-based pricing tiers: 2-3 years = ₹3000-4000, 3-5 years = ₹2500, dead AC = ₹2000

Add validation and error handling to the backend submitAC function in backend/main.mo to catch and return descriptive error messages for invalid submissions (missing fields, invalid data formats, or storage failures)
Fix issue where customer contact details are not displayed after submitting the AC quote form
Fix issue where owner contact details are not appearing when customer submits quote
Fix Admin Dashboard login functionality - clicking on Admin Dashboard should trigger authentication/login

Update the Admin.tsx page to implement proper authentication flow checking - if user is not authenticated when accessing /admin route, display the login prompt and trigger the Internet Identity authentication process automatically
Verify that the useInternetIdentity hook's login() function in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts properly initializes the AuthClient and handles the authentication callback correctly

Test and verify the Internet Identity AuthClient configuration in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts to ensure the identity provider URL is correct and the authentication window can successfully open and communicate with the Internet Identity service

Add detailed error logging in the backend submitAC function in backend/main.mo to log validation failures, duplicate submission checks, and any storage operation errors, ensuring error messages are descriptive and returned to the frontend

Verify and fix the backend getAllCustomerContacts function in backend/main.mo to ensure it correctly retrieves all customer contact details (name, phone, email) and handles the assertIsAuthenticated check without rejecting legitimate authenticated principals
